com.nevermindsoftware.urlparser

Class UrlParser

  • com.nevermindsoftware.urlparser.UrlParser

  • public class UrlParser

    Core Url Parser instance. Uses a TLD source to load TLD suffixes to parse raw string domains

    • Constructor Detail

      • UrlParser

        public UrlParser(@NotNull
                 TLDSource tldSource)

        Core Url Parser instance. Uses a TLD source to load TLD suffixes to parse raw string domains

        Parameters:
        tldSource - tld source to use. The results of this call are not cached and the tld source will be queried each time

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        @NotNull
public Url parse(@NotNull
                          java.lang.String url)

        Parses a raw url string into a Url object

        Parameters:
        url - The url to parse (e.g. http://www.example.com/path?qp1=2&qp2=b)

      • getTLD

        @NotNull
public java.lang.String getTLD(@NotNull
                                        java.lang.String host)

        Get the tld from a url host. Note that this method does not expect a full url, only the host part (e.g. example.co.uk)

        Parameters:
        host - the host to parse the TLD from
